explains: n. （尤指乡村的）小旅馆，小酒馆；（用于旅馆的名字中）酒店，饭店
wordGroup: holiday inn n. 假日酒店；假日旅馆

sentences.en: I always feel at home at Ye Olde Starre Inn.
sentences.cn: 在昨日星辰客栈，我总是觉得非常舒适安逸。

sentences.en: I learnt that the house had formerly been an inn.
sentences.cn: 我得知这座房子以前是家客栈。

sentences.en: She washed her face at the pump in front of the inn.
sentences.cn: 她在客栈前的水泵旁洗了洗脸。
